item.description:
This is a pretty good event for beer aficionados and/or blues fans. Tickets are $25, with a free commemorative cup, if purchased before July 20th
Description from their website: http://www.bluesnbrews.com/index.html

When:

Saturday, August 20, 2011
RAIN OR SHINE
Noon - 7pm (Gate opens at 11:30pm)


Where:

Nashoba Valley Ski Area, Westford, Mass.


What:

• Live Music - TOP BLUES BANDS
• Dozens of Regional Craft Breweries, PLUS a special booth featuring cask-conditioned ale
• GREAT Food, such as BBQ, grilled chicken, hotdogs/hamburgers, Oktoberfest food, snacks, etc!
• Homebrew Competition awards
• Collectible quality program book featuring bands & breweries
• Raffles, Games, Homebrew Demonstrations, Craft & Vendor Booths, more!

Cost:

$30 in advance ($25 Early Bird price, if you purchase tix at least a month in advance)
$35 at the door*
(*walk-in admission is subject to availability.)

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Blues and Brews festival in Westford, MA
